summary: New textures of rings. Standalone or Replacer.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][size=5][i]New Generic rings[/i][/size][/font]
[size=1]Sorry, I'm not good at English. This is the very short description.[/size]

[size=2]This mod adds new standalone rings to Skyrim or replaces the texture of the vanilla ring.
You can choose standalone version or replacer version.
If you install standalone version, the ring box is placed at Fralia Gray-Mane's market in front of the Bannerd Mare Inn.
Replacer version is compatible with the ring meshes of "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27038/?]Jewels of the Nord[/url]" or "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53767/?]DovahBling Jewelry Replacer[/url]".
Replacer for "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?]Static Mesh Improvement Mod[/url](SMIM)" and "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52266/?]Gemling Queen Jewelry[/url]" is another download file.[/size]
author: uni_SL

files.name: New generic rings
files.changelogHtml:
- Added the replacer for "Static Mesh Improvement Mod(SMIM)" and "Gemling Queen Jewelry".
- Renewed the textures for standalone version and replacer for "Jewels of the Nord" or "DovahBling Jewelry Replacer".
- Modified the ring meshes for standalone version.
